OpenVivoe

The Open Source Implementation of the VIVOE norm

Demo Download
  • View on GitHub
  • Wiki
  • Created by: Hoel Vasseur at OpenWide Ingenierie
  • Follow @OpenWide_Inge
  • Tweet

What is OpenVivoe?

VIVOE is a military norm to stream video from several sources to several sinks. Video streaming uses is based on RTP and SAP/SDP while streaming management uses SNMP. OpenVivoe is the Open Source impementation realized by OpenWide Ingenierie, a French Open Source architecte.

Dependencies

  • Streaming based on Gstreamer 1.6.3
  • Configuration based on Glib 2.46.2
  • Management based on NET-SNMP 5.7.3

Get Started

HTML

PrismJS is used as the syntax highlighter here.

Below are the details of the custom PrismJS build used in this template. You can build your own version via their website should you need to.

  • Compression level: Minified
  • Theme: Okaidia
  • Languages: Markup, CSS, C-like, JavaScript, PHP and Python

    <p class="my-style">
      Hello World!
    </p>
